title: Serious Sam HD The Second Encounter - Cracked Multiplayer [VOKSI
description:
How to run the game:

1. Install the game.

2. Run SamHD_TSE.exe, when the window opens, keep it open.

3. login to your Steam account.

4. Go to instslled games and click "Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter"

5. Then click "Properties" and in the opened windows choose "Local Files".

6. Run "VERIFY INTEGRITY OF GAME CACHE" and wait to proceed to 100%

7. When its ready, wait some time and click "Play" ÃÂ½ÃÂ° Serious Sam HD: TSE ÃÂ¾Ã‘â€š Steam.

8. Eventually there are few features that will be installed, but game still wont work. Let them to complete.

10. When Steam appears login

11. When you are in Steam, click any key to start the game in black window

12. Find server or create yours and invite friend.

For your safety is recommended to use new steam account insted of one which you have purchased games.
